Package org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.xsort

Class SpilledRuns

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.xsort.SpilledRuns
public class SpilledRuns extends Object
Represents the set of spilled batches, including methods to spill and/or merge a set of batches to produce a new spill file.
